00128 inline Region Region::operator+ (const Region& region) const
00129 {
00130     Region temp;
00131     
00132     for ( std::vector<PixelCoordinates>::const_iterator i = this->coordinates_.begin(); i not_eq coordinates_.end(); ++i )
00133         temp.addCoordinates( (*i) );
00134     
00135     for ( std::vector<PixelCoordinates>::const_iterator i = region.coordinates_.begin(); i not_eq region.coordinates_.end(); ++i )
00136         temp.addCoordinates( (*i) );
00137     
00138     return temp;
00139 };
